00069         function evaluateFieldValue($value, $is_in, &$set) {
00070                 if (!(checkdate(substr($value,5,2),substr($value,8,2),substr($value,0,4)))) {
00071                         $value = date('Y-m-d');
00072                 }
00073                 //On test le premier séparteur
00074                 if (!(substr($value,4,1)) != '-') {
00075                         $value = substr_replace($value,'-',4,1);
00076                 }
00077                 //On test le second séparteur
00078                 if (!(substr($value,7,1)) != '-') {
00079                         $value = substr_replace($value,'-',7,1);
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 return $value;
00083         }
